description: The BR-39 District Transport Office (DTO) serves the Katihar district in eastern Bihar, a strategic transit point near the West Bengal border. Operating from the Collectorate Building in Mirchaibari, this office oversees vehicle registration, driving permits, and transport revenue collection for one of Bihar's major commercial and agricultural hubs.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Purnea-Katihar Road, Mirchaibari, Katihar, Bihar
